main event: A civilian observed a kite-like object moving in a northward direction for approximately 15 minutes on 6 October 1966.
interesting points: The object was reported to appear transparent and clear.,The movement speed was estimated at approximately 30 mph.,The object moved behind a house during the observation.,The sighting is consistent with the launch of a balloon from suburban Dayton, Ohio.,The observer described no sound associated with the object.
witness description: A civilian male, 58 years old, residing in Xenia, Ohio.
